title: No Bake Nut Cookies
ingredients: 3 1/2 c. bite size shredded rice biscuits
steps: In heavy 2 qt. saucepan, combine sugars, milk, butter/margarine and pecans.
Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until mixture bubbles on top.
Continue boiling and stirring for 5 minutes.
Remove from heat and stir in vanilla.
Add rice biscuits and mix well.
Drop by spoonfuls on waxed paper to make about 30 clusters.
Let stand at room temperature for 30 minutes until firm.

title: Jewell Ball'S Chicken
steps: Spread meat over bottom of baking dish.
Mix soup and sour cream together.

title: Cheese Balls
steps: Place on waxed paper or baking sheet.

title: Chicken Funny
steps: Debone and cut up into bite size pieces.
Put in medium square casserole dish.
Pour gravy and soup over chicken.
Stove Top stuffing should be kept slightly dry.
Shred cheese and sprinkle on top.
Bake at 350° for 20 minutes or until bubbly and light brown.

title: Reese'S Cups Candy
steps: Press into bottom of ungreased 13 X 9-inch pan.
Refrigerate 20 minutes or until firm enough to cut.
Cut when chocolate is still soft.

title: Cheeseburger Potato Soup
steps: Wash potatoes and prick several times with a sharp knife.
Microwave at high for 6 to 8 minutes or until tender when pierced with a knife.
Cut each potato in half lengthwise.
Scoop out the pulp and discard the skins.
Brown meat in skillet over medium heat.
In large pot combine butter/margarine, flour and stir until smooth.
Cook over low heat for 1 minute.
Stir in milk gradually, stirring constantly until mixture is thickened and bubbly.
Add potatoes, meat, salt, pepper, cheese, green onion and bacon.
Stir in sour cream, if desired.
Garnish with remaining cheese, bacon and green onion.

title: Rhubarb Coffee Cake
steps: Alternately add buttermilk and dry ingredients.
Top with batter and bake at 350° until done.

title: Scalloped Corn
steps: Dot top with remaining 4 teaspoons butter.

title: Nolan'S Pepper Steak
ingredients: 1 1/2 lb. round steak, cut up in strips
steps: Combine remaining tomato juice from can with water and onions.
Add steak, cover and simmer 1 hour and 15 minutes.
Uncover, add Worcestershire sauce and tomatoes, then add green peppers.

title: Millionaire Pie
steps: Drain pineapple and mix with whipped topping.
Squeeze juice from lemons, remove seeds and add to mixture.
Chop pecans and add to mixture.

title: Double Cherry Delight
ingredients: 1 can (17 oz.) dark sweet pitted cherries
steps: Add enough water to make 1 1/2 cups total liquid.
Dissolve gelatin in 2 cups boiling water.
Chill until firm, at least 4 hours or overnight.

title: Buckeye Candy
steps: Mix together powdered sugar, butter and peanut butter.
Roll into small balls and put on cookie sheet.

title: Quick Barbecue Wings
steps: Microwave on high for 4 minutes, stirring once during cooking.

title: Taco Salad Chip Dip
steps: Mix together taco sauce, sour cream and cream cheese.
Brown ground beef, draining off excess fat.
Layer with lettuce, tomato, onion and green pepper.

title: Pink Stuff Frozen Dessert
ingredients: 1 can cherry or strawberry pie filling
1 container (8 oz.) frozen whipped topping, thawed

title: Fresh Strawberry Pie
ingredients: 1 qt. fresh strawberries, washed and drained
steps: Combine water, cornstarch, sugar and salt.
Bring to boiling point, stirring constantly.
Remove from fire and add jello.
Cool slightly but do not let set.
Layer strawberries in bottom of pie crust.

title: Easy German Chocolate Cake
steps: Prepare both mixes according to package directions.
Add 1/4 cup Wesson oil to chocolate cake mix.
Pour into a 9 x 13-inch baking pan.

title: Broccoli Salad
steps: Add bacon, green onions or red onion and raisins.
In a separate bowl, combine mayonnaise, vinegar and sugar.
Toss salad together and refrigerate at least 2 to 3 hours.

title: Strawberry Whatever
ingredients: 1 lb. frozen strawberries, drained and cut up in bite size pieces
steps: Mix together gelatin and boiling water.
Add berries, pineapple and bananas to gelatin mixture.
Spread half of this mixture on bottom of cake pan.
Remove from freezer and spread 1 pint sour cream evenly over top.
Then pour remainder of mixture over top.

title: Grandma Hanrath'S Banana Bread
steps: Add eggs, one at a time.
Bake in loaf pan at 350° for 1 hour.

title: Chocolate Frango Mints
steps: Beat for 5 minutes, scraping bowl often.
Fold in 6 oz. chopped Frango Mints.

title: Cuddy Farms Marinated Turkey
steps: Cut whole turkey breast into hand sized pieces.
Mix together 7-Up/Sprite, vegetable oil, soy sauce and garlic salt.

title: Spaghetti Sauce To Can
steps: Cook peppers and onions in oil.
Combine tomatoes, tomato paste, sugar, salt, basil, oregano and Italian seasoning.

title: Smothered Round Steak
steps: Cover and cook slowly over low heat until tender.

title: Easy Fudge
steps: Heat milk and chocolate chips over low heat.
Spread on wax paper-lined baking sheet.

title: Taco-Filled Green Pepper
steps: Bake covered at 350° for 15 to 20 minutes.
Top with tomato, cheese and sour cream.

title: One Hour Rolls
steps: Heat milk, sugar, salt and oil until boiling.

title: Summer Chicken
ingredients: 1 lb. boneless, skinless chicken breast or thigh cutlet(s)

title: Cherry Pizza
steps: Spread cherry pie filling in greased baking pan.
Sprinkle dry white cake mix on top of cherry pie filling.
Top with ground nuts and melted butter.

title: Potato And Cheese Pie
steps: Beat eggs, salt and pepper together.

title: Tuna Macaroni Casserole
steps: Prepare macaroni and cheese according to directions.
Stir in tuna, pimento sauce and onion.

title: Artichoke Dip
steps: Bake, uncovered, at 350° for 20 to 30 minutes.

title: Broccoli Dip For Crackers
ingredients: half of 6 oz. shredded Cheddar cheese

title: Summer Spaghetti
steps: Marinate overnight with Salad Supreme seasoning and Italian salad dressing.

title: Pear-Lime Salad
steps: Boil juice and dissolve gelatin in it.
Mix with cream cheese and yogurt.

title: Watermelon Rind Pickles
steps: Combine sugar, vinegar, spices and pour over rind.

title: Chicken Stew
steps: In large pot, combine chicken, potatoes, onions, corn, peas, beans, tomatoes and macaroni.
Cook over medium heat until all vegetables are tender.

title: Quick Coffee Cake
steps: Bake in greased 8-inch square cake pan at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes.

title: Angel Biscuits
steps: Mix together flour, sugar, baking powder and soda.
Cover and refrigerate at least 8 hours or overnight.

title: Quick Peppermint Puffs
steps: Wrap each marshmallow with crescent roll dough.

title: Chocolate Mint Bars
steps: Bake at 350° for 25 to 30 minutes or until top springs back slightly.

title: Chicken Divan
steps: Stir in flour and curry powder.
Add enough water to reach 1/2 cup liquid.
Mix together mushroom juices and soup.
Arrange broccoli and chicken in baking dish.

title: Mexican Cookie Rings
steps: Sift together flour, baking powder and salt.
Cream butter and sugar until fluffy.

title: Vegetable-Burger Soup
steps: Brown meat lightly in soup pot.
Add remaining ingredients and simmer for 20 minutes.

title: Chicken Cordon Blue
steps: Pound chicken breasts until they are thin.
Lay cheese and ham on each breast.
Roll up and secure with toothpicks.
Mix together flour, salt, pepper and paprika in plastic bag.
Add rolls and shake to coat.
Melt butter in frying pan and brown rolls on both sides.
Add white wine and bouillon cube.
Remove chicken and add whipping cream to pan.
Cook on medium high for 3 minutes until smooth and creamy.

title: Corn Casserole
ingredients: about 3/4 of 1 (16 oz.) container fat free sour cream
steps: Mix together corn, corn, margarine and dry cornbread mix.

title: Poppy Seed Bread
ingredients: 1 pkg. Betty Crocker butter pecan cake mix
steps: Mix together poppy seeds and boiling water.
In large mixing bowl combine cake mix, coconut pudding, oil and eggs.
Pour into two greased loaf pans.

title: Buttermilk Brownie Cake
steps: In saucepan, combine butter, cocoa and water.
Bring to boiling point, stirring constantly.
Pour into greased 15 x 10 x 1-inch pan.
Immediately pour frosting on top and spread evenly.

title: Seven Layer Salad
ingredients: 3 medium eggs, boiled and cut in small pieces
1 c. grated sharp or mild cheddar cheese
steps: Layer salad ingredients in following order:
lettuce, tomatoes, boiled eggs, cheese, peas, mayonnaise and bacon bits.
Cover with mayonnaise and sprinkle bacon bits on top.

title: Taco Salad
steps: Combine meat, vegetables, spices and seasonings.
Add salt and pepper to taste.
Cook on low for 3 to 4 hours in crock-pot.

title: Pizza Dippers
ingredients: 10 oz. can Pillsbury refrigerator pizza crust
steps: Unroll dough and cut it in half across.
Then cut each piece in half again, making 8 pieces.
Place them apart on the cookie sheet.
Remove from oven and sprinkle with cheese.

title: Madge'S Refrigerator Rolls
steps: Sprinkle yeast on top of sugar.
Scald milk with sugar, shortening and salt.
Cover and let rise until doubled.
Turn out onto floured board and knead lightly.
Put two small balls of dough each in melted oleo.

title: Super Sundae Pie
ingredients: 2 pt. vanilla ice cream, slightly softened
steps: Cover with plastic wrap and place in refrigerator.
Let set overnight or several hours.
Remove from refrigerator and let sit at room temperature for 10 minutes.
Place strawberry topping on serving dish.
Put slice of pie on top.
Garnish with chocolate sundae syrup, nuts, whipped cream and maraschino cherries.

title: Cranberry-Orange Relish For Poultry
ingredients: 1 (16 oz.) can pear halves, drained and chopped
steps: Bring to boiling point over medium heat.
Reduce heat and simmer until relish is thick enough to coat the back of a spoon.

title: Swedish Heirloom Cookies
steps: Dredge warm cookies in powdered sugar.

title: Garden Cabbage Salad
steps: Toss dressing with salad just before serving.

title: London Broil
steps: Combine salad oil, vinegar and minced garlic together.
Broil 3 inches from heat about 5 minutes.
Carve very thin slices diagonally across the grain.

title: Hello Dolly Bars
steps: Spread on bottom of greased 9 x 13-inch pan.
Layer chocolate chips, butterscotch chips, walnuts and coconut.

title: Macaroni And Cheese Casserole
ingredients: 1 can condensed cream of mushroom soup
steps: Before baking, cover with crumbled cheese crackers and dot with butter.

title: Betsy'S Chocolate Fudge Cake
steps: Grease and flour two to three (9-inch) cake pans.
Sift together flour, baking powder and salt.
Add sugar and beat until creamy.
Beat in eggs, one at a time, beating well after each egg added.
Sift dry ingredients alternately with sour cream, beating well after each addition.
Remove cakes from pans when done.
Turn out onto cooling rack and cool completely.
Icing is made by mixing 1 cup milk chocolate chips and 1 cup white chocolate chips in heavy saucepan.
Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly until melted and smooth.
Remove from heat and let stand 1 minute.
Stir in 1/2 cup chopped nuts or raisins.

title: Cheese Cake
steps: Mix cake mix, egg and margarine.
Press into bottom of 9 x 12-inch cake pan.

title: Beef Barbecue
steps: Cook on low to medium heat 3 to 4 hours or until meat can be shredded easily.
If liquid evaporates, add more water and ketchup.

title: Chicken Stroganoff
ingredients: 1 lb. chicken breasts, cut up into thin strips
steps: In skillet at medium heat, heat 1 tablespoon of the vegetable oil.
Bring to boiling point and boil 1 minute, stirring constantly.

title: Recipe Text:Cream Pie And Pudding(Microwave)
steps: Add eggs or egg yolks and milk.
Cook on high power for 8 minutes, stirring 3 times.

title: Crispix Cookies
steps: Remove from heat when mixture is smooth.
Drop by teaspoon on waxed paper.

title: Rum Balls
steps: Melt chocolate and corn syrup together.
Add rum and stir to blend.
Roll each ball in remaining powdered sugar.
Store in airtight container for at least 3 days.

title: Millionaire Cake
ingredients: 20 oz. can crushed pineapple and juice
steps: Bake in 9 X 13-inch pan at 350° for 45 to 55 minutes.

title: Hawaiian Carrots
steps: Cook 1/2 cup pineapple juice with cornstarch, oleo and sugar.

title: Ginny'S Salad
ingredients: 2 pkg. Good Seasons Italian salad dressing
steps: Wash, dry and break up lettuce.

title: Onion Soup
steps: Cook onions in butter and oil.
Add sugar and cook 15 minutes or until onions are brown.
Sprinkle with flour and blend in broth and seasoning.
Toast bread in 350° oven for 20 minutes.
Baste each slice with 1/2 teaspoon of vegetable oil and minced garlic.
Serve soup over toast that has floated on top.
Grate Swiss cheese and sprinkle on top.

title: Banana Walnut Cake
steps: Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each egg.
Add baking powder, soda and salt.
Add sour milk alternately with flour mixture.

title: Fish And Broccoli Roll-Ups
steps: Put fish on top of broccoli.
Add lemon wedge at each end of skewer.

title: Fat Free Pizza Treats
steps: Put 1 tablespoon of Mozzarella cheese on top.

title: Sesame Chicken Wings
ingredients: freshly ground black pepper to taste
steps: Whisk together soy sauce, garlic, ginger, honey and pepper.
Add wings with wing tips removed and toss to coat.
Marinate, covered and chilled, for 2 hours.
Line baking sheet with foil and place wings on it, arranged in one layer.
Brush wings with Oriental sesame oil.
Sprinkle with sesame seeds that have been toasted lightly.
Bake at 400° for 30 to 35 minutes, brushing with reserved marinade periodically until browned.

title: Macaroni And Cottage Cheese
steps: Mix cottage cheese in hot macaroni.
Add salt and pepper to taste.

title: String Pie
steps: Spread on bottom of 13 x 9-inch baking dish.

title: Coconut Macaroons
steps: Combine coconut, flour, sugar and salt.
Add egg whites and almond extract.
Drop batter by teaspoon over cherries.
Bake at 325° for 20 to 25 minutes or until edges are golden brown.

title: Cranberry Salad
steps: Dissolve Jell-O and sugar in water.

title: Lazy Day Salad
ingredients: 1 large can crushed pineapple with juice

title: Pear Relish
steps: Let pear mixture stand in separate containers for 1 hour.
Pour boiling water over each container and let stand until cooled.
Combine all ingredients in a large kettle.
Bring to a boil and reduce heat.
Remove air bubbles and wipe rims clean.
Process in boiling water bath 20 minutes.

title: Strawberry Bread
ingredients: 2 1/2 c. fresh strawberries or 2 (10 oz.) cans frozen strawberries, thawed
steps: Grease and flour two 9 x 5-inch loaf pans.
In medium bowl, crush berries or thaw frozen berries.
Stir together with eggs and salad oil.
Combine flour, sugar, cinnamon, soda, salt and nuts in large bowl.
Add berry mixture to dry ingredients.
Bake 1 hour or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean.

title: Strawberry Salad
steps: Dissolve jello in 1 cup boiling water.
Add pineapple, bananas, nuts and enough sour cream to make 4 cups.
Pour half of this mixture into a pan.
Spread on top of other half of mixture.

title: Chili Beef Casserole
steps: Heat over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until bubbly.
Cover lightly with foil and bake 5 to 7 minutes or until melted.

title: Bread
steps: Bake at 350° for 30 minutes to 1 hour until golden brown.

title: Salmon Casserole
steps: Place reserved liquid from salmon can in a bowl.
Cover and bake at 350° for 30 minutes.

title: Carrie'S Cabbage Soup
steps: Add 1 lb. ground beef (browned, optional) or 1 lb. sausage in last 20 minutes.

title: Chicken And Pasta Salad
ingredients: 3 cooked chicken breasts, cut into small pieces
steps: Combine egg noodles, chicken, grapes and almonds.
Mix together mayonnaise, Ranch dressing, creamy Italian dressing and a little sugar to taste.
Pour dressing over salad and toss.

title: Calico Beans
steps: Bake in casserole dish at 350° for 45 minutes.

title: Ham Roll-Up
steps: Spread soft cream cheese on top of ham.
Place breadstick on each slice of ham.

title: Penne Al'Arrabbiato
ingredients: whole tiny red peppers to taste
steps: Cook pasta DeCecco penne, plain or rigati.
Simmer in open skillet until pasta is done.

title: Spinach Dip
steps: Pour Sangaree Punch over ice mold.

title: Chicken Pot Pie
steps: Lightly grease a 9 x 13-inch baking dish.
Line bottom of dish with 2 cups cooked chicken, cut up.
Mix together 1 can Veg-All vegetables, 1 can cream of chicken soup, 1 can cream of onion soup and 1 can cream of mushroom soup.
Spread mixture on top of chicken.
Mix together 1 1/2 sticks butter or margarine, 1 cup milk and 1 1/2 cups flour.
Pour this mixture over soup layer.
Bake at 350° for 30 to 40 minutes until golden brown.

title: Fruit Pizza
steps: Spread Pillsbury cookie dough on baking sheet.
Bake 12 to 13 minutes at temperature listed on box.
Mix together cream cheese and sugar.
Decorate with fruit of your choice.

title: Grasshopper Pie
steps: Press into bottom of pie pan.
Fill with marshmallow fluff, creme de menthe and whipped cream.

title: Squash Souffle
ingredients: 2 c. yellow squash, cooked and mashed
2 Tbsp. butter or Land O Lakes sweet cream spread
1 c. grated reduced fat Cheddar cheese
steps: Pour into a Pam-sprayed casserole dish.
Bake at 350° for 30 to 45 minutes until firm.

title: Apple Kuchen
ingredients: 4 medium size apples, peeled and cut in rounds
steps: Press each part into bottom and sides of 8 x 8 x 2-inch pan.
Place apple slices on top of dough.
Sprinkle with sugar and cinnamon mixture.
Melt butter and pour over apples.
Let rise until doubled in bulk.
Bake at 350° for 40 to 50 minutes or until golden brown.

title: Eggplant-Tomato Casserole
steps: Peel and slice eggplant into 1/4-inch rounds.
Cover and bake at 400° for 30 to 40 minutes or until eggplant is tender.

title: Strawberry Bread
steps: Add to dry ingredients just enough to moisten them.
Pour into two greased loaf pans.

title: Meatball Stew
steps: Combine cornflakes, egg, beef broth, salt, pepper and beef.
Add tomato soup, water, thyme, carrots, onions and potatoes.

title: Cauliflower-Broccoli Casserole
steps: Simmer cauliflower and broccoli until tender.
Combine vegetables and cheese mixture with 1 cup cooked rice.

title: Cabbage Casserole
steps: Saute celery, bell pepper and onion in margarine.
Remove from heat and stir in soup and pimento.
Top with stuffed herb stuffing made by mixing butter with stuffing and then adding it to the casserole.

title: Best Ever Salad
ingredients: 8 oz. fine spaghetti or 7 oz. Mexican angel hair

title: Black Bottom Cupcakes
steps: Bake at 350° for 30 to 35 minutes in cupcake liners that have been greased or lined with paper cups.

title: Tuna Casserole
ingredients: 1 large box Kraft macaroni and cheese dinner
steps: Prepare macaroni and cheese according to directions.
Cook and drain peas if frozen.
Combine with tuna, soup, peas and water.
Add salt and pepper to taste.

title: Chili Con Carne
ingredients: 1 (No. 303) can kidney beans, rinsed and drained
steps: Stir in chili powder, salt and pepper.
Reduce heat and simmer 30 minutes stirring often.
If too thick, add hot water.

title: Swiss Chicken Casserole
ingredients: 2 c. Pepperidge Farm herb stuffing mix
steps: Arrange chicken in lightly greased 12 x 8 x 2-inch baking dish.
Top each piece of chicken with a slice of cheese.
Mix soup and milk together and pour over chicken.
Cover and bake at 350° for 50 minutes or until done.

title: No Bake Cookies
steps: Stir in marshmallows, peanuts, Rice Krispies and Cap'n Crunch.
Drop by teaspoon onto waxed paper.

title: Slyline
steps: Garnish with apple slices and sprig of mint.

title: Peach Cobbler
steps: Put peaches on top without stirring.

title: Green Bean Specialty
steps: Mix together bacon grease, brown sugar, vinegar and military.

title: Raspberry Nut Perfection(Serves 8)
ingredients: 1 (1 lb. 6 oz.) can red raspberry pie filling
steps: Mix cake mix, water and egg together.

title: Mexican Chicken
steps: Layer onions, cheese, Doritos and soups on top.

title: 10 Minute Peanut Brittle
steps: Mix together sugar, corn syrup and salt.
Add peanuts and microwave 2 to 6 minutes, stirring every 2 minutes until slightly browned.
Stir in butter/margarine, vanilla and soda.
Spread 1/4 inch thick on well buttered cookie sheet.

title: Chocolate Oatmeal Cookies
steps: Drop by teaspoon on waxed paper.

title: Pastry Crunch
steps: Melt candy coating in microwave according to directions.

title: Chippewa Soup
steps: Heat small amount of oil in very large pot.
Add vegetables and saute until tender.
Add garlic and cook a few minutes longer.
Add tomato puree, water, ham, potatoes, herbs, peas and seasonings.
This is a base that should be slightly salty.

title: Coconut Cream Pie(Low Calorie)
ingredients: 2 boxes sugar free instant vanilla pudding
4 oz. Cool Whip lite whipped topping

title: Voodoo Chicken
steps: Mix together vinegar, soy sauce, onion, garlic and pepper.
Add chicken and let marinate overnight.
Remove chicken and coat with mixture of mustard and ketchup.
Bake, skin side down, at 350° for 30 minutes.
Turn chicken, then mix remaining mustard and ketchup with milk and remaining marinade.
Pour this mixture over chicken and bake another 45 minutes.

title: Chicken Divan
steps: Cut up into bite size pieces.
Mix together soup, curry powder and lemon juice.
Mix bread crumbs and margarine together.

title: Old Fashioned Tea Cakes
steps: Add eggs, one at a time.
Mix in milk, nutmeg and vanilla.
Add enough extra flour to roll and cut.
Bake on ungreased cookie sheet at 325° for 15 minutes.

title: French Toast And Sauce
steps: Beat eggs, milk, lemonade and salt.
Melt butter in skillet for each slice of bread.
Cook until brown on both sides.

title: Spaghetti Pie
steps: Add olive oil and mix well.
Stir in Parmesan cheese and eggs.
Press into 10-inch pie pan that has been sprayed with Pam.
Spread cottage cheese on bottom of pie pan.
Pour spaghetti sauce over meat mixture.

title: Favorite Chocolate Cake
steps: Pour into greased and floured tube or 9 x 13-inch cake pans.
Bake at 350° for 30 minutes in tube pan or 40 minutes in other size pan.

title: Friendship Tea
steps: Use 3 tablespoons of mixture per cup of hot water.

title: Heath Bar Pie
steps: Mix Heath Bars and whipped topping.
Top with chocolate curls or chopped nuts.

title: Victorian Baked French Toast
steps: Cook sugar, butter and corn syrup together until melted.
Mix eggs, milk and cinnamon together.

title: Quick Swedish Meatballs
steps: Blend remaining milk with sauce mix.

title: Irish Stew(Microwave)
steps: Cover and microwave on High 7 to 8 minutes.
Cook on Power Level 3 for 35 to 40 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Blend remaining water and flour together.

title: Peach Salad
steps: Dissolve jello in 2/3 cup hot water.
Add sugar and stir until dissolved.

title: Hidden Valley Ranch Oyster Crackers
ingredients: 1 pkg. Hidden Valley Ranch salad dressing mix
steps: Mix together salad dressing mix, salad oil, lemon pepper, dill weed and garlic powder.
Pour mixture over crackers and stir until coated.
Warm crackers in very low oven for 15 to 20 minutes.
